Public Member Functions

 AstException (const std::string &msg)

Detailed Description

This class represents an exception that may occur within the Abstract Syntax Tree Library for TinyJava.

An AstException includes a message indicating the cause for the exception.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AstException::AstException ( const std::string &  msg  )  [inline]

Construct an AstException exception object indicating a problem within an Abstract Syntax Tree.

Parameters:
msg a message describing the error.
